short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a clock on the 'New Tab' page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that makes the 'New Tab' page distraction-free by replacing it with a simple, digital clock.

Furthermore, it shows some convenient shortcut links at the bottom of the 'New Tab' page.



Source code (licensed under GPLv3): https://github.com/JannesMeyer/chrome-tab-clock
